title: When I Logged Into Club Chat...
body:
Only to learn... http://i1.ytimg.com/vi/J_Z-RICO-BI/maxresdefault.jpg

now, I AM A COMMISSAR!

replies.body: Same. Malicious told me its just to look fancy...  IS MY LIFE A LIE?
How does one join the memer club? Or am I not memey enough to be a real memer in the memer club?

I know you are going to hate me for this. But give me a chance.

Actually no, don't give me a chance, give everyone else a chance. I messed up trying to make M&G a better place. I just want to ask one thing and just that you at least know the truth and why it actually went so out of hand.

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/gJrkTBtt-what-started-the-meme-war?comment=0003

And okay, if you don't want to support me or hate my guts or whatever, at least talk to MM, or Rubick, or Ventura, or Heretic Lunari, or Embertine....

I am going to try to make it up to those i can, one person at a time. >.<
Airman, you do not carry this burden alone. I will not let you.
Careful macro, if the extremeists find out, you will be targeted too... like me...

if it's Fish's Domain, speak with Metal

if it's Airmans, speak with her
